SageTVPlugin.Name: Movie Showtimes
SageTVPlugin.Description: Allows you to browse for movie showtimes in the Online Services Menu
SageTVPlugin.Author: evilpenguin
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
* v1.2 * Added support for more trailers thanks to http://www.hd-trailers.net/ * Added settings menu for setting location and selecting streaming resolution * Added trailers for movies coming soon and opening this weekend * Lots of code clean up
* v1.1 * Switched to Google for movie times source * Can now input any location (Zip, Address, City, whatever) * By popular demand: 100% more Canada * Added trailers if available on Youtube * Added movie info to date field * Added theater phone # to date field * Improved sorting, theaters are sorted by number of screens and movies are sorted by number of theaters * Improved meathod of entering Online Services Menu (Thanks Andy!) * Updated STVi text to indicate that you can enter any zipcode
* v1.0 * Initial Release - Allows browsing for movie times in the Online Services Menu
